description: Describes a dataset. Amazon Lookout for Metrics API actions are eventually consistent. If you do a read operation on a resource immediately after creating or modifying it, use retries to allow time for the write operation to complete.

nested_items.name: MetricSetArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the dataset.

nested_items.name: AnomalyDetectorArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the detector that contains the dataset.

nested_items.name: MetricSetName
nested_items.description: The name of the dataset.

nested_items.name: MetricSetDescription
nested_items.description: The dataset's description.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the dataset was created.

nested_items.name: LastModificationTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the dataset was last modified.

nested_items.name: Offset
nested_items.description: After an interval ends, the amount of seconds that the detector waits before importing data. Offset is only supported for S3, Redshift, Athena and datasources.

nested_items.name: MetricList
nested_items.description: A list of the metrics defined by the dataset.

nested_items.name: MetricName
nested_items.description: The name of the metric.

nested_items.name: AggregationFunction
nested_items.description: The function with which the metric is calculated.

nested_items.name: Namespace
nested_items.description: The namespace for the metric.

nested_items.name: TimestampColumn
nested_items.description: Contains information about the column used for tracking time in your source data.

nested_items.name: ColumnName
nested_items.description: The name of the timestamp column.

nested_items.name: ColumnFormat
nested_items.description: The format of the timestamp column.

nested_items.name: DimensionList
nested_items.description: A list of the dimensions chosen for analysis.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: MetricSetFrequency
nested_items.description: The interval at which the data will be analyzed for anomalies.

nested_items.name: Timezone
nested_items.description: The time zone in which the dataset's data was recorded.

nested_items.name: MetricSource
nested_items.description: Contains information about the dataset's source data.

nested_items.name: S3SourceConfig
nested_items.description: Contains information about the configuration of the S3 bucket that contains source files.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of an IAM role that has read and write access permissions to the source S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: TemplatedPathList
nested_items.description: A list of templated paths to the source files.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: HistoricalDataPathList
nested_items.description: A list of paths to the historical data files.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: FileFormatDescriptor
nested_items.description: Contains information about a source file's formatting.

nested_items.name: CsvFormatDescriptor
nested_items.description: Contains information about how a source CSV data file should be analyzed.

nested_items.name: FileCompression
nested_items.description: The level of compression of the source CSV file.

nested_items.name: Charset
nested_items.description: The character set in which the source CSV file is written.

nested_items.name: ContainsHeader
nested_items.description: Whether or not the source CSV file contains a header.

nested_items.name: Delimiter
nested_items.description: The character used to delimit the source CSV file.

nested_items.name: HeaderList
nested_items.description: A list of the source CSV file's headers, if any.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: QuoteSymbol
nested_items.description: The character used as a quote character.

nested_items.name: JsonFormatDescriptor
nested_items.description: Contains information about how a source JSON data file should be analyzed.

nested_items.name: FileCompression
nested_items.description: The level of compression of the source CSV file.

nested_items.name: Charset
nested_items.description: The character set in which the source JSON file is written.

nested_items.name: AppFlowConfig
nested_items.description: Details about an AppFlow datasource.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: An IAM role that gives Amazon Lookout for Metrics permission to access the flow.

nested_items.name: FlowName
nested_items.description: name of the flow.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchConfig
nested_items.description: Details about an Amazon CloudWatch monitoring datasource.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: An IAM role that gives Amazon Lookout for Metrics permission to access data in Amazon CloudWatch.

nested_items.name: BackTestConfiguration
nested_items.description: Settings for backtest mode.

nested_items.name: RunBackTestMode
nested_items.description: Run a backtest instead of monitoring new data.

nested_items.name: RDSSourceConfig
nested_items.description: Details about an Amazon Relational Database Service (RDS) datasource.

nested_items.name: DBInstanceIdentifier
nested_items.description: A string identifying the database instance.

nested_items.name: DatabaseHost
nested_items.description: The host name of the database.

nested_items.name: DatabasePort
nested_items.description: The port number where the database can be accessed.

nested_items.name: SecretManagerArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS Secrets Manager role.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The name of the RDS database.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: The name of the table in the database.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the role.

nested_items.name: VpcConfiguration
nested_items.description: An object containing information about the Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) configuration.

nested_items.name: SubnetIdList
nested_items.description: An array of strings containing the Amazon VPC subnet IDs (e.g., subnet-0bb1c79de3EXAMPLE.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupIdList
nested_items.description: An array of strings containing the list of security groups.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: RedshiftSourceConfig
nested_items.description: Details about an Amazon Redshift database datasource.

nested_items.name: ClusterIdentifier
nested_items.description: A string identifying the Redshift cluster.

nested_items.name: DatabaseHost
nested_items.description: The name of the database host.

nested_items.name: DatabasePort
nested_items.description: The port number where the database can be accessed.

nested_items.name: SecretManagerArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS Secrets Manager role.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The Redshift database name.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: The table name of the Redshift database.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the role providing access to the database.

nested_items.name: VpcConfiguration
nested_items.description: Contains information about the Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) configuration.

nested_items.name: SubnetIdList
nested_items.description: An array of strings containing the Amazon VPC subnet IDs (e.g., subnet-0bb1c79de3EXAMPLE.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupIdList
nested_items.description: An array of strings containing the list of security groups.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: AthenaSourceConfig
nested_items.description: Details about an Amazon Athena datasource.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: An IAM role that gives Amazon Lookout for Metrics permission to access the data.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The database's name.

nested_items.name: DataCatalog
nested_items.description: The database's data catalog.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: The database's table name.

nested_items.name: WorkGroupName
nested_items.description: The database's work group name.

nested_items.name: S3ResultsPath
nested_items.description: The database's results path.

nested_items.name: BackTestConfiguration
nested_items.description: Settings for backtest mode.

nested_items.name: RunBackTestMode
nested_items.description: Run a backtest instead of monitoring new data.

nested_items.name: DimensionFilterList
nested_items.description: The dimensions and their values that were used to filter the dataset.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The dimension that you want to filter on.

nested_items.name: FilterList
nested_items.description: The list of filters that you are applying.

nested_items.name: DimensionValue
nested_items.description: The value that you want to include in the filter.

nested_items.name: FilterOperation
nested_items.description: The condition to apply.
